attributes.action: change the day that elections are held from a thursday to either saturday or sunday
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: thursday elections require schools to be closed to be used as polling stations. this disrupts the education of the children and requires parents to either arrange childcare or to take time off work. As less people work at weekends, it also means that the people who work at elections do not have to take a day off from their normal work.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
